agera5 0.0.0.9007

    This set of functions extract precipitation data from locally stored AgERA5 data

    get_prec.Rd

    This set of functions extract precipitation data from locally stored AgERA5 data

    Usage

    get_prec(...)

# S3 method for period
get_prec(.start_date, .end_date, .lon, .lat, .agera5_folder)

# S3 method for dataset
get_prec(
  .trial_dataset = NULL,
  .start_date = "pdate",
  .end_date = "hdate",
  .lon = "lon",
  .lat = "lat",
  .agera5_folder
)

    Arguments

    .start_date

    Date or character to be coerced as Date The starting date for the period to extract

    .end_date

    Date or character to be coerced as Date The end date for the period to extract

    .lon

    numeric Longitude for the point of interest

    .lat

    numeric Latitude for the point of interest

    .agera5_folder

    Folder in the local system where the agera5 data is stored. Usually the root folder will work as the function will search recursively

    .date

    a date or character representing the date of the data point to be extracted

    Methods (by class)

    • period: Get precipitation data for one location for a provided time period

    • dataset: Iterates across a data set to extract all required data points

    On this page
